= Overview =

The Vehicle Purchase Type is used to create a vehicle through the team's [TechDoc_Architecture_Game_Entities_VehSpawnPoint Vehicle Spawn Points] which the player can then enter and operate.


= [TechDoc_Architecture_Game_PurchaseTypes_Vehicle_Functionality Functionality] =


= XML Definition =
{{{
<Vehicle Name="us-ltv" />
}}}

 * Name - The name of the vehicle implementation to create.
